finding: Classes should be under 200 lines for maintainability
decision_impact: Set module size limit at 200 lines

finding: Extract Method pattern helps break large functions
decision_impact: Use for splitting init command into smaller functions

finding: Python packages should use __init__.py for public API
decision_impact: Each package will have __init__.py with __all__ exports

finding: Google recommends modules under 1000 lines but prefers smaller
decision_impact: Supports our 200 line limit as best practice

finding: Human working memory handles 7±2 items effectively
decision_impact: Keep module interfaces to <10 public functions
Use relative imports with absolute fallback for subprocesses

finding: Typer uses decorators for command registration
decision_impact: Maintain decorator pattern in refactored commands

finding: Rich components are self-contained and reusable
Strangler Fig pattern for gradual migration
decision_impact: Can refactor modules incrementally while keeping old code

finding: Move Method pattern for relocating functions
decision_impact: Use to move functions to appropriate modules by cohesion
